RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Claiming Purse 13600. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROLLESTON broke sharp to the front while well handled on the lead throughout stayed well clear while much best. HAPPYSECRET chased winner to no avail, hold the place spot to the wire wide. SAINT SISTA raced along evenly with no late response in the stretch run. ONTOTHENEXT raced along evenly no late response when needed. FLAT OUT FAY never menaced throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Saint Sista
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late response in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Flat Out Fay
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Rolleston
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp to the front, well handled on the lead throughout much best

ENTRY.NAME: Ontothenext
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late run when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Happysecret
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to no avail, hold the place spot to the wire wide

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 12700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since April 4 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DESOTO'S WAR quickly to the front, dictated pace throughout and ran off easily in the final furlong. SUGGESTED chased winner throughout with no late kick in the stretch. SAG HARBOR raced along evenly from inside throughout. KANTPAYTHETOLL could not keep up throughout and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Kantpaythetoll
ENTRY.COMMENT: could not keep up throughout and trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Sag Harbor
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly from inside throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Suggested
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner throughout with no late kick in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Desoto's War
ENTRY.COMMENT: quickly to the front, dictated pace throughout, ran off easily

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 4, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DROP IT off rail speed to the front, dueled to quarter pole under stout handling, cleared through the stretch run and gamely held to the wire. P K WOOD rated off leaders to turn, wide stretch run could not get pas while on the wrong lead entire stretch run. HESTON no speed to quarter pole, widest run in the stretch for show spot. SENSE SHINES saved ground with speed, dueled to the stretch but used up and weakened in the late going. LIMITED D'ORO chased from inside to the turn, gave in readily and dropped back. TOM'S LAST GENERAL never menaced throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Heston
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to quarter pole, widest run in the stretch for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Limited d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased from inside to the turn, gave in readily and dropped back

ENTRY.NAME: Tom's Last General
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Sense Shines
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground with speed, dueled to the stretch weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: P K Wood
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated off leaders to turn, wide stretch run on the wrong lead

ENTRY.NAME: Drop It
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail speed to the front, dueled to quarter pole, cleared held

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 19000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since April 4 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Any Maiden Races, And Only Claiming Races And Only Starter Races For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOVELY LISA had a sharp start with good position between horses to the stretch and roused while switching leads several times to go late. SHUTUPANDSHAKEIT inside speed to the front, battled hard to deep stretch but outgamed to the wire. MIND YOUR OWN bobbled at the start, lagged back to stretch, rallied on for the show late. ABITIBI saved ground with no speed to the stretch run, passed one late. AWESOMELY SHY good position while three wide throughout with no gain in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Shutupandshakeit
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front, battled hard to deep stretch, outgamed

ENTRY.NAME: Mind Your Own
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled at the start, lagged back to stretch, up for show late

ENTRY.NAME: Lovely Lisa
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp start with good position between horses to stretch clear

ENTRY.NAME: Abitibi
ENTRY.OWNER: Esquivel Maria and Esquivel Jose Jesus
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground with no speed to the stretch run, passed one late

ENTRY.NAME: Awesomely Shy
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position while three wide throughout with no gain in stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 16400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 4, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since April 4 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Al lowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUICKY DESIRE unhurried to the turn, five wide run into the stretch and cleared late. HABOBANERO chased leader early, dueled turn and into the stretch while outgamed late, best of the rest. AFERDITA never far back outside to turn, four wide to bid stretch, weaken. MAUREENLOVESFRANK awkward start, no speed to the stretch, wide run to improve late. FOOT RUB LOVE unhurried from gate, raced back to the stretch, no late advance. MY DARK SECRET good position between horses into the stretch while fading. BELIEVING inside speed to the front, clear to the stretch, gave in readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Foot Rub Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried from gate, raced back to the stretch, no late advance

ENTRY.NAME: Maureenlovesfrank
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, no speed to the stretch, wide run to improve late

ENTRY.NAME: Believing
ENTRY.OWNER: Kuntz Mark D and Dalton Ken
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front, clear to the stretch, gave in readily

ENTRY.NAME: Quicky Desire
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to the turn, five wide run into stretch, cleared late

ENTRY.NAME: Habobanero
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader early, dueled turn and stretch, outgamed late

ENTRY.NAME: My Dark Secret
ENTRY.OWNER: First and Goal LLC and Geraci Tim
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position between horses into the stretch while fading

ENTRY.NAME: Aferdita
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back outside to turn, four wide to bid stretch, weaken

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24000. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWEET SHILD O MINE quick to the front, widened each call to run off in hand to wire. PRONTO CHARLI no speed to the turn, rallied up inside stretch run best of rest. LA CORONA chased runaway winner to the stretch, weakened for show spot. COMPUTER WHIZ up close to the half, gave way while losing ground in the stretch. WHYNAUGHTY dropped far back from the turn, never a threat throughout. OHIO LADY tried to keep up early with nothing left from the turn. TWILIGHT BEAUTY brief chase to turn, stopped readily thereafter. APPALACHIAN SPIRIT dropped far back in the stretch run, crossed wire.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Shild O Mine
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to the front, widened each call to run off in hand to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Whynaughty
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped far back from the turn, never a threat throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Twilight Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief chase to turn, stopped readily thereafter

ENTRY.NAME: Appalachian Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Clark Rick Clark Brent W Wolfe Joe and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped far back in the stretch run, crossed wire

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up early with nothing left from the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Computer Whiz
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close to the half, gave way while losing ground in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: La Corona
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased runaway winner to the stretch, weakened for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Pronto Charli
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the turn, rallied up inside stretch run best of rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 4, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHT J J quick to the front, set all pace throughout and held sway to the wire under good handling. DOWN HOME KITTEN good position to the half, lost ground into far turn and rallied, came back for place spot. CAPPY HOUR lunged at the start, raced back to the half and ran on through the far turn but hung in the stretch run. FRANKIE BARONE inside postition to the half but could not gain in the stretch run. LOOKS GOOD N A TUX raced wide into first turn, stayed close to far turn but faltered back in the stretch run. LUCKYINKENTUCKY never a menace throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Down Home Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to the half, lost ground far turn, came back for 2d

ENTRY.NAME: Frankie Barone
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside postition to the half, could not gain in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight J J
ENTRY.OWNER: Sweet Carolina Racing and Bourbon LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to the front, set all pace throughout, held sway to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Cappy Hour
ENTRY.OWNER: Adams James M and Cox Christopher J
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged at the start, raced back to the half, ran on far turn hung

ENTRY.NAME: Looks Good N a Tux
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide into first turn, stayed close to far turn, faltered back

ENTRY.NAME: Luckyinkentucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: never a menace throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 4, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WARIS saved ground to the turn, angled out three wide, drove past in the late stages under stount handlng and crused past to the wire while ridden out with a good effort. SCAPITURE no speed to the stretch, angled widest into stretch for place. LOTTA MOSCATO inside speed to stretch, dueled late while no match held place. BROOKLYNN'S DABOMB speed to the front, stayed to deep stretch, outbid final stages. GRANADICA chased top pair early on, gave in from the quarter pole. KNELCOCK inside position throughout with no late kick in the stretch run. CONCORDSDIFFERENCE outside trip to turn, dropped back in the stretch run from inside.

ENTRY.NAME: Knelcock
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside position throughout with no late kick in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Scapiture
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the stretch, angled widest into stretch for place

ENTRY.NAME: Lotta Moscato
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to stretch, dueled late while no match held place

ENTRY.NAME: Waris
ENTRY.OWNER: Rowena Beck Racing Stable LLC and Mayfield Jr Frank
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to the turn, angled out three wide, cruised past

ENTRY.NAME: Brooklynn's Dabomb
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, stayed to deep stretch, outbid final stages

ENTRY.NAME: Concordsdifference
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside trip to turn, dropped back in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Granadica
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top pair early on, gave in from the quarter pole
